HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - Updated to 1.3 |- New: Option to toggle allowing slaves |- Fix: Now benches are supported |- Fix: Smokeleaf now correctly goes into stock |- Tweak: Waiting is not a skilled job anymore |img:images/Patron |caption:Updating Gastronomy takes a lot of time. To sustain my mod development, I'm running a Patreon page that I need your help with. You can join my community for direct support, discussing my mods and giving feedback. So if you feel curious, grateful or generous, please take a look by clicking the link above! |If this mod update causes issues, don't hesitate to contact me (and remember to include the Ctrl-F12 error log!).
